document_data.name: Haki
document_data.mainbody: '''Haki''' was a young street acrobat who performed in [[Huzuz]], the City of Delights, around [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Description: Haki wore a loose [[sash]] which, when combined with the streaming bands from his [[turban]], accentuated his gymnastic movements.
document_data.Activities:
Haki performed energetic and acrobatic routines with the hopes of snaring the eyes of nobles who might offer him employment within their homes.

Haki's performances were only a front. The boy was actually a young [[holy slayer]] for the [[Everlasting]]. He planned to infiltrate the noble society of Huzuz and await the day he was called by his order to serve.
document_data.Relationships: Haki was the assistant and pupil of [[Hamida]], a local street dancer.
